DOC.HEADLINE: ' 93 / ' 94 YEAR-END REVIEW AND OUTLOOK ; INDUSTRY OUTLOOK ; CONTINUING LOW-GRADE GROWTH IN THE NATIONAL ECONOMY , COUPLED WITH HOPES FOR STABILITY -- IF NOT EXPANSION -- IN CALIFORNIA , IS THE BACKDROP FOR THE YEAR IN BUSINESS . HERE IS AN ASSESSMENT OF KEY INDUSTRIES ' PROSPECTS .
DOC.TEXT: ENVIRONMENTAL SERVICES : Efforts to export U.S. technology could take_up some -- but not enough -- of the slack as a sluggish economy and manufacturers ' efforts to cut hazardous-waste liabilities leave big waste-management companies and environmental engineering firms scrambling for customers . MICHAEL PARRISH
